statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 13 \\ -14 \\ -5 \\ 15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
